NAME: removebank
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to remove money from a user's bank.
OPTION_USER_DESCRIPTION: The user you want to remove money from their bank.
OPTION_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: The amount you want to remove.
IS_BOT: Cannot remove change from a bot's bank account.
TITLE: Removed money on {{username}}'s bank account.
RESULT: You just removed {{amount}}xin from the {{user}}'s bank account.
